overview: An ambitious remake of a 1932 gangster classic nearly implodes under the weight of its egotistical creators, grandiose star, and over the top style; but instead it proves its harsh critics wrong by becoming a huge hit and pop culture phenomenon. Now, through cast and crew interviews, stock footage and original material, we get a first-hand account of the trials and tribulations that occurred while making this landmark film.
title: Inside Story: Scarface
